en.same_anime: both $1$ and $2$ as the same amount of anime watched
en.same_watch_time: both $1$ and $2$ watched anime for the same amount of time
en.genre_anime: $1$ prefer the $1a$ genre and $2$ prefer the $2a$ genre for anime
en.same_genre_anime: both $1$ and $2$ prefer the $1a$ genre for anime
en.tag_anime: $1$ prefer the $1a$ tag and $2$ prefer the $2a$ tag for anime
en.same_tag_anime: both $1$ and $2$ prefer the $1a$ tag for anime
en.same_manga: both $1$ and $2$ as the same amount of manga read
en.genre_manga: $1$ prefer the $1a$ genre and $2$ prefer the $2a$ genre for manga
en.same_genre_manga: both $1$ and $2$ prefer the $1a$ genre for manga
en.tag_manga: $1$ prefer the $1a$ tag and $2$ prefer the $2a$ tag for manga
en.same_tag_manga: both $1$ and $2$ prefer the $1a$ tag for manga
